name: The v0.69 Hotfix Blade
imagePrompt: A sleek, futuristic digital sword made of scrolling text, displaying an endless list of bug fixes and new features, with a glowing Lens symbol on the hilt. Style: High-tech, clean, dynamic.
abilityText: After your hero attacks, draw a card. 'Fixes coming soon.' They've been saying that since mainnet.
flavorText: Patch notes: Fixed issue where sword worked correctly. Now it works incorrectly but faster.

weaponEffect.description: After your hero attacks, draw a card.
